#summary The datagrid disabled attribute indicates whether the element is inaccessible.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-whatwg

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [DatagridElement <datagrid> element] > *disabled attribute*

== Usage ==

{{{
<datagrid disabled>
<datagrid disabled=disabled>
}}}

== Values ==

This is a stand-alone attribute; its value, if present, must be the same as its name.

== Elements ==

You can use the `disabled` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AElement <a>]
  * [AreaElement <area>]
  * [ButtonElement <button>]
  * [CommandElement <command>]
  * [DatagridElement <datagrid>]
  * [EmbedElement <embed>]
  * [InputElement <input>]
  * [LinkElement <link>]
  * [OptgroupElement <optgroup>]
  * [OptionElement <option>]
  * [SelectElement <select>]
  * [StyleElement <style>]
  * [TextareaElement <textarea>]
